header.description: Property.  Single pressure reading. This message is appropriate for measuring the  pressure inside of a fluid (air, water, etc). This also includes  atmospheric or barometric pressure.  This message is not appropriate for force/pressure contact sensors.  timestamp of the measurement

fluid_pressure.description: Property.  frame_id is the location of the pressure sensor  Absolute pressure reading in Pascals.

variance.description: Property.  0 is interpreted as variance unknown
